organization.name: Belarusian State Pedagogical Univ. named after Maxim Tank, Minsk (Belarus)

person.name: Yurchenko, E.O., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). The V.F. Kuprevich Institute of Experimental Botany

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied a mycoflora of the National Park 'Pripyatski'. As a result of realized research there were revealed physical and geographical conditions of the National Park 'Pripyatski', its climatic conditions, geology, topography, soils, hydrography, hydrology, flora and vegetation, materials and methods, history of the study of mycobiota of the area', ecology and the role of fungi in the formation of the National Forest Park. Analysis of biota of agaricoid Basidiomycetes of the National Park 'Pripyatskij', description and analysis of fungi Afilloforoidnye was made. Fungi, which are developing on the wood species, herbaceous plants and soil, phytopathogenic fungi on the medicinal plants, soil fungi, Red Book, rare and very rare species of macromycetes of National Park 'Pripyatskij', rare and new Aphyllophoraceous fungi found on the territory of the National Park, new types of micromycetes for Belarus found on the territory of the National Park, rare species of mushrooms agaricoid in custody in the herbarium of MSK-F, an annotated list of fungi National Park 'Pripyatski' were presented.
